content: * Moderately increases the damage dealt by all Pillar Stance moves. A loong can be summoned to execute Thunder at the enemy at Pillar Stance heavy attacks that cost 3 or 4 Focus
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Loong_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Loong Staff'.
The content is as follows:
* Moderately increases the damage dealt by all Pillar Stance moves. A loong can be summoned to execute Thunder at the enemy at Pillar Stance heavy attacks that cost 3 or 4 Focus
